# Quick Share - WebRTC File Sharing Application

This is a Next.js-based peer-to-peer file sharing application using WebRTC for direct browser-to-browser file transfers.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- Socket.io for WebRTC signaling
- WebRTC for P2P file transfer
- QR code generation with auto-rotation

## Features
- Real-time P2P file sharing (no server storage)
- Auto-rotating QR codes (10s intervals) for security
- Session-based authentication
- Dark/Light mode support
- No file size limits
- No login required
